t:type.name: AlexaColor
t:type.t:description: Represents the color state object used by Alexa V3

t:attribute.name: hue
t:attribute.description: Indicates the hue attribute of the color. A double that ranges from 0.0 to 360.0, inclusive.

t:attribute.name: saturation
t:attribute.description: Indicates the saturation attribute of the color. A double that ranges from 0.0 to 1.0, inclusive.

t:attribute.name: brightness
t:attribute.description: Indicates the brightness attribute of the color. A double that ranges from 0.0 to 1.0, inclusive.
